mapper.sql: id, user_id, stat_date, submit_count, accept_count, problem_solved, code_lines, study_duration, created_time
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(submit_count), 0) as totalSubmissions, COALESCE(SUM(accept_count), 0) as totalAccepted, COALESCE(SUM(problem_solved), 0) as totalProblemsSolved, COALESCE(SUM(code_lines), 0) as totalCodeLines, COALESCE(SUM(study_duration), 0) as totalStudyDuration FROM learning_statistics WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT lp.user_id as userId, COALESCE(SUM(ls.submit_count), 0) as totalSubmissions, COALESCE(SUM(ls.accept_count), 0) as totalAccepted, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lp.status = 'COMPLETED' THEN lp.problem_id END) as totalProblemsSolved FROM learning_progress lp LEFT JOIN learning_statistics ls ON lp.user_id = ls.user_id GROUP BY lp.user_id ORDER BY totalProblemsSolved DESC, totalAccepted DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_statistics ( user_id, stat_date, submit_count, accept_count, problem_solved, code_lines, study_duration, created_time ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{submitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{problemSolved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeLines,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studyDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW() )
